name: places/ChIJFRmrLRRawokRBjIz3E-6C94
formattedAddress: 7 Hanover Square, New York, NY 10004, USA
adrFormatAddress: 7 Hanover Square, New York, NY 10004-2616, USA

originalText.text:
This company is the worst company I have ever worked for in a 35 year career.  They have zero respect for their employees work satisfaction or work/life balance.

I took a job as a subject matter expert.  Within a couple weeks, a team member left the company and I was assigned a job for which i had no experience or expertise.  I received no training or assistance, but I muddled through for a few months.

Then the person I was supposed to replace cycled off the project and I was told I had to do his job as well.  They didn't have the resources to bring in anyone else.  This meant that between the 2 jobs, I started my day with a 6:00 or 6:30 AM call with India, worked straight through to 6:00PMto try to keep up with 2 jobs, and then they expected me to get on a webex from 6:00PM to 8:00PM to give training to a client in Australia.
When I demanded some help, they gave me a new hire right out of college who I had no time to train, and wouldn't have been able to truly help for weeks or months.

I had to quit or I would have been divorced, dead, or both by the time this project ended.

originalText.text: This company is a joke. From security flaws to badly developed software and/or applications.
